notice.title: Demo Version Available!
notice.text: Try the demo version of the game now!

hero.description:
Defend your base from endless waves of zombies.
Build towers, upgrade defenses and become a legend!

towers.title: Epic Towers
towers.text: Over ?? unique towers with different abilities and upgrades

zombies.title: Various Zombies
zombies.text: ??+ types of zombies with unique attacks and abilities

abilities.title: Powerful Abilities
abilities.text: Use special skills to destroy enemies

coop.title: Co-op Mode
coop.text: Play with friends up to 4 players simultaneously

rankings.title: Rankings
rankings.text: Compete for first place in the global leaderboard

gameplay.title: Engaging Gameplay
gameplay.description: Apocalypse Tower Defense is a strategy game where you defend your base from endless waves of zombies. Build towers, upgrade them and use tactics to win!

recruitment.title: We're Looking for Talent!
recruitment.text: Join our team and help create the best tower defense game on Roblox! We're looking for: programmers, 3D modelers, designers, testers, and marketers.

codes.title: Promo Codes
codes.subtitle: Activate codes and get rewards in the game!

info.title: How to use codes?
info.text: Copy the code, enter the game and enter it in the settings menu. Codes are case sensitive!
